          The Best Features Of Our Retail POS System 

          DAY-TO-DAY PERFORMANCE

          Check on your store’s daily performance through auto-generated graphs based on your sales data

          visibility & control of inventory

          Easily sort through your products and get a clearer picture of which items are low on stock. SmartReorder then suggests reorder amounts based on your sales data.

          CLOUD-BASED POS SYSTEM

          Our Retail POS Singapore allows users to access real-time data and manage your business easily through a web browser, anytime and anywhere.

          Save Up To 98% Of The Cost From Various Government Grants

          PRODUCTIVITY SOLUTIONS GRANT

          Introduced by the IMDA, this grant encourages businesses to invest in digital solutions, offering up to 80% in subsidies.

          Skills Future Enterprise Credit

          Eligible employers will receive a one-off S$10,000 credit to cover up to 90% of the remaining cost.

          We Are A Pre-Approved Vendor

          EPOS is a Pre-Approved Vendor of the grants mentioned above. Our solutions are automatically eligible and available for grants.

          Check Eligibility

          SOME FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

          Grants

          How Do I Qualify For The Aforementioned Grants

          For all the grants mentioned, one of the main criterion is that you must be a local business. Following that, all other eligibility criteria vary. You can read more on the eligibility criteria of the Productivity Solutions Grant, which heavily subsidises the majority of the POS System cost here.

          How Is It Possible To Receive Up To 98% In Subsidies

          If you meet the eligibility criteria, it is possible to achieve the 98%. Here’s how: the Productivity Solution Grant subsidises up to 80% of the total cost for companies that adopt long-term technological solutions, of which EPOS is listed as a pre-approved vendor. Furthermore, Skills Future Enterprise Credit covers up to 90% of the remaining cost, which is 18%. This gives you a total of 98% in subsidies.

          How Do I Apply For The Grants

          Being a pre-approved vendor of the Productivity Solutions Grant (PSG), we are able to guide you through the process of filling out the grant application form. 

          SkillsFuture Enterprise Credit is based on your Productivity Solutions Grant application. Should you meet the eligibility criteria of the SFEC grant, it will automatically be applied to you when you apply for PSG.

          For the Digital Resilience Bonus, if you meet the eligibility criteria, the solution company, (in this case EPOS) will handle the submission process.

          What Is A Pre-Approved Vendor

          For all the grants mentioned above, they have a list of pre-approved vendors. There are two criteria that need to be fulfilled before a grant can be approved. The first, is whether the applicant meets all the applicable eligibility criteria which varies from grant to grant.

          Next, is whether the technological solution adopted will help a company improve in different business aspects such as efficiency and profitability. To make the process easier, companies apply for the pre-approved status which involves meeting the grants’ stringent requirements to qualify as a technological solution provider that helps the retail industry.

          Once vendors become pre-approved for the grants, all that’s left is for applicants to meet the eligibility criteria in order for the grant to be approved.

          Features

          Cloud-Based POS

          A cloud-based POS system allows retail owners to view and manage their business from any web browser. They can view their sales and inventory data anytime and anywhere, giving them the ability and flexibility to make better business decisions.

          Inventory Management System

          EPOS provides one of the most advanced inventory systems in the market to help retailers manage their inventory with maximum efficiency. Our inventory management system automatically updates your business stock count to give you an accurate, summarised overview of your business using real-time data.

          We offer a data-driven reordering software that uses sales and inventory data to help retailers manage and re-order their stock to avoid overstocking or understocking.

          Ecommerce Integration

          Allows you to integrate your online stores with our POS system. This means that you can manage all your orders from one POS terminal, giving you seamless control over your businesses. Currently available for Shopify, WOOcommerce and OpenCart.

          Accounting Integration

          Integrate an industry-leading accounting software with our POS system. It automatically syncs sales and inventory data to generate your financial reports, thus helping to cut down on human errors and increase efficiency. This makes handling taxes and sales reports less of a headache as well.

          Packages and Pricing

          What Types Of Packages Are There

          At the moment we offer 3 different packages. You can find out more information on each package here.

          What Types Of Hardware Are Included In The Package

          Across all packages, the standard hardware included are a 13-Inch Touchscreen POS Terminal, a Handheld Laser Barcode Scanner, a Thermal Receipt Printer, a Cash Drawer, a Keyboard and a Mouse.

          Depending on the package, there may be additional hardware included such as a Barcode Labelling Device or a Handheld Stocktaking Device.
